ComicInfo.Title: Reaper's Widow
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Reaper’s Widow” Mary Fowler, in her guise of Mary Widow, begins her journey of revenge on those who killed the love of her life, Max Dunn, AKA the Red Mask…
Mary Fowler’s father was Oswald Fowler, Crimeboss of Paradise Falls. He was assassinated before her eyes at the age of eight. She grew up in her mother Sally’s bordello/night club. At twenty-three she met and fell in love with crusading District Attorney Max Dunn, unaware he was the crime-fighting vigilante known as Red Mask. Shortly after, Max was murdered. Mary believes at the hands of corrupt government officials. With Sally’s help she creates the persona of Mary Widow, a lethal femme fatale who is out to avenger her lover’s death.
